title: McDermid ends Raith Rovers support over Goodwillie signing
shortDescription: Scottish crime writer Val McDermid has taken to Twitter to declare her lifelong support of Raith Rovers has ended over the signing of David Goodwillie.

title: PFA outlines reforms in pursuit of 'absolute parity' for female players
shortDescription: The PFA has warned there is much work to be done to achieve parity between female players and their male counterparts after outlining pioneering contract reforms.

title: Championship Team of the Month
shortDescription: WhoScored.com run through their Championship Team of the Month for January.

title: Lampard wants Cole to join Everton coaching staff
shortDescription: New Everton manager Frank Lampard wants former Chelsea team-mate Ashley Cole to join him as part of his coaching staff at Goodison Park.

title: ‘Ekitike can become a top striker’
shortDescription: Oscar Garcia on what makes Hugo Ekitike so good and how he is developing young talent at Stade Reims by using what he has learned from Johan Cruyff and Ralf Rangnick.

title: How Auba's dramatic Deadline Day move to Barca unfolded
shortDescription: Take a look at how one of the biggest moves on Deadline Day happened as Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang left Arsenal for Barcelona on a free transfer.

title: Alli 'excited' and 'delighted' to join Everton
shortDescription: Dele Alli says he's excited to work under Frank Lampard at Everton as he signed a permanent deal with the Toffees, after seven years at Tottenham Hotspur.

title: Hammers failed in late bid to sign Zapata on Deadline Day
shortDescription: West Ham failed in a late bid to sign Atalanta striker Duvan Zapata on Deadline Day.

title: Defoe joins Sunderland until end of season
shortDescription: Jermain Defoe has joined Sunderland on a deal until the end of the season.

title: Arsenal's gamble, Liverpool's forward planning, Newcastle's big push
shortDescription: Transfer window talking points as Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang's exit leaves Arsenal light and Liverpool snap up their Sadio Mane successor.

title: Alli joins Everton: 'I want to be happy playing football'
shortDescription: Dele Alli has joined Everton permanently from Tottenham in a deal that could cost up to £40m.

title: Ramsey's Rangers move caps off dramatic January window
shortDescription: Rangers pulled off a stunning deadline day coup with Aaron Ramsey joining on loan with Celtic, Hibernian and St Johnstone also busy during the window.

title: How much did your club spend? | PL tops £300m
shortDescription: How much did Premier League clubs spend on transfers during the winter window? We crunch the numbers...

title: Deadline Day: Final team-by-team round-up
shortDescription: The Transfer Show's Dharmesh Sheth and Kaveh Solhekol round up the final transfer news from all 20 Premier League clubs on Deadline Day.

title: Palace complete late deals for Mateta and Plange
shortDescription: Crystal Palace have completed two late Deadline Day moves after signing on-loan forward Jean-Philippe Mateta permanently and Derby teenager Luke Plange.

title: Aubameyang completes free transfer to Barcelona
shortDescription: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has signed for Barcelona on a free transfer from Arsenal.

title: Papers: Arsenal missed out on De Tomas
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Tuesday's national newspapers...

title: Cantwell becomes Bournemouth's fifth Deadline Day signing
shortDescription: Bournemouth have signed Todd Cantwell on loan from Norwich until the end of the season.

title: Newcastle sign Burn | January spending over £90m
shortDescription: Newcastle have completed the signing of centre-back Dan Burn from Brighton for £13m to take their spending above £90m this month.

title: Carvalho's Liverpool deal collapses | Phillips, Williams leave on loan
shortDescription: Liverpool's move for Fabio Carvalho has fallen through after the Premier League side ran out of time to complete the deal on Deadline Day.
